# VEHICLE::ATTACH_VEHICLE_ON_TO_TRAILER

## Summary
Attaches a vehicle on to the back of a trailer. This limits the mass of the vehicle put onto the trailer to reduce physics issues

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicleIndex
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** trailerIndex
* **FLOAT** firstEntityOffsetX
* **FLOAT** firstEntityOffsetY
* **FLOAT** firstEntityOffsetZ
* **FLOAT** secondEntityOffsetX
* **FLOAT** secondEntityOffsetY
* **FLOAT** secondEntityOffsetZ
* **FLOAT** vecRotationX
* **FLOAT** vecRotationY
* **FLOAT** vecRotationZ
* **FLOAT** physicalStrength

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This is the proper way of attaching vehicles to the car carrier, it's what Rockstar uses. Video Demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2lVEIzf7bgo
